A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This was a heavy handed flogging the Star Wars Franchise that seeming told "fan boys" that "this isn't the Star Wars you remember. Let the past go".

More that than\, it was shoehorned into the Marvel MCU formula. It's a two and a half hour advertisement for the next movie.

The one shining thing from this movie is\, Adam Driver made Kylo Ren interesting. 

I guess that's a win at least.
